definition: surname Wei/vassal state during the Zhou Dynasty (1066-221 BC), located in present day Henan and Hebei Provinces
to guard/to protect/to defend/abbr. for 衛生|卫生, hygiene/health/abbr. for 衛生間|卫生间, toilet

sentences.english: Liuunder the protection of the Red Guards had for a happy life.
sentences.chinese: 柳溪村在赤衛隊的保護下過了一段愉快的日子。

sentences.english: From Wanan eighty revolutionary peasants returned with our men to the Chingkang Mountains and were organized as the Wanan Red Guards.
sentences.chinese: 有八十個革命農民跟隨到井岡山，組織萬安赤衛隊。

sentences.english: Looking through his field-glasses , he saw the Red Guards closing from all directions .
sentences.chinese: 從望遠鏡裏，他看到赤衛隊從四邊圍了上來。

sentences.english: Red Guards in a planned counterattack in the Pan mother to save the expense of the owner.
sentences.chinese: 赤衛隊在一次策劃反擊中，潘母爲救所有人犧牲了。
